'''Forest Watcher's Choice''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Mushroom Hodgepodge]] with [[Tighnari]]. The recipe for Mushroom Hodgepodge is obtained by completing the {{Quest|Cooking, the Flavor of Nature}}.

Forest Watcher's Choice increases all party members' defense by '''151''' for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
